name: Render.js
tagline: JavaScript and jQuery two way data binding and DOM templating
body:
Render.js is JavaScript/jQuery two way data binding and DOM templating engine. View examples here http://stash.trifolium.hr/render_plugin Syntax looks like this (CoffeScript). For JavaScript go to examples and view source. ``` $(node).render template: """

Timer in ms

""" start_timer: -> @_timer = setInterval => @node.time.html (new Date()).getTime() @node.start.disable() @node.stop.enable() , 100 once: -> @start_timer() bind: start:-> @start_timer() stop: (node)-> clearInterval @_timer @node.start.enable() @node.stop.disable() ```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
